Description: Recruiterflow is modern applicant tracking software for recruiting and staffing agencies designed to do your busywork, so you can focus on what's important.
Name: Recruiterflow

Methods.Name: Update Candidate
Methods.Description: Updates the candidate specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List Updated Candidates
Methods.Description: Retrieves candidates updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: List New Candidates
Methods.Description: Retrieves candidates created since the last run.

Methods.Name: Get Candidate
Methods.Description: Retrieves the candidate specified by ID.

Methods.Name: Update Client
Methods.Description: Updates the client specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List Updated Clients
Methods.Description: Retrieves clients updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: Get Client
Methods.Description: Retrieves the client specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Clients
Methods.Description: Retrieves clients created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Updated Jobs
Methods.Description: Retrieves jobs created or updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: Get Job
Methods.Description: Retrieves the job specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves contacts created since the last run.

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Retrieves the contact specified by ID.

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Updates the contact specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves contacts updated since the last run.
